info.description: Performance tracking for published content, including views, engagement, and AI generation metrics.

Views.description: Total number of views for this content

Shares.description: Number of shares across social platforms

Comments.description: Number of comments on the content

EngagementRate.description: Calculated engagement rate as a percentage

GenerationTimeMs.description: Time taken by AI agent to generate content (in milliseconds)

AgentVersion.description: Version of the AI agent that created this content

LastUpdated.description: When these metrics were last updated
